detailsOfAchievement: The Genesis: Late Mr. Binoy Kumar singh who was retired Sergeant from Indian Air force struggling with the hilly, and barren land provided by the govt. and trying his best to bring that into agric able and cultivable. During that time he and his wife Late Mrs. Janki singh were also initiated social work for the betterment of the under privilege classes in the area especially the women and children. His strenuous toil transformed the barren land to a fertile one. He taught the people how to cultivate crops by using the technique of biological farming. He was a great environmentalist and social activist. He started the Chipko Movement against the contractors and saved the forest of Chechali and Jitpur. By his effort, the awareness among the people to save the environment got a new dimension. He was not merely a farmer but also an architect who contributed towards the moral development of human being. People had great respect for him. We built well knit village organizations in 50 Villages of our working area. Each village is a unit, its people decide to work to resolve their basic need. The work is done by all for all as partners and organized as cadres to fulfil different functions of the whole. There is no discrimination based on gender, caste or wealth. It is true that there may be different levels of involvements: but the underlying spirit is that all are partners, and so one is a subordinate of another. Also, nothing great can be achieved without volunteers who are committed to regular participation and are properly organized. Individuals working in isolation are not enough to build a well knit village organization. Due to the functional structure and regular community based actions. We have archived the following i.e. Elimination of intoxication, Reduction in Domestic Violence on women, Reduction in Communal caste based discrimination, Reduction in Dowry and Divorce, Built an pro active environment for women and hiding girls to enjoy dignified modern life, Enhanced Leadership capacity to access the services, Created opportunities for the early school leaver youth to regain vocational skills to live with job to accelerate their quality of life.

detailsOfAchievement: Since last five year our major action were focused for maximum utilization of natural resources for reducing poverty through agricultural activities for the benefit of tribal women farmers and labourer with the coverage of targeted villages of Jharkhand promoted paddy cultivation through SRI technique. Renovation of ahar pyne was done. together with this programme for water sanitation and hygiene was also taken.We are also working for child rights and thus services are given to them.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: The Purpose of the given project was to Empower the Marginalised Community especially (SC) Community in order to transform their Socio Economic condition to improve their standard of living and thus fight for their rights and entitlement.
The Purpose of the given project is to reduce poverty through integrated water management practices to establish and replicate among marginalized communities to increase and access their entitlement.

The main purpose of the project was to strengthen and access to Tribal Sub Plan and SCP through mobilisation, Advocacy and thus capacitating them to know the schemes provided to these communities and then take benefit of these schemes. And also to strengthen CSO and community network for realization of TSP at state level.

The purpose of the project was to improve water sanitation and hygiene practices of the community in the targeted area so that the people of the targeted area will learn how to improve their living by practicing hygiene and sanitation so that they can be safe and live healthy life.

The main purpose of the projectvwas to enhance the process of accessing justice through the Special Courts and ensuring just judicial outcomes for SC ST victims of atrocities cases. And in this way make the community aware about such cases.

The main purpose of the project was to reduce poverty in the targeted villages through integrated water management. The models of the water management practices is to be establised and replicated amongst the marginalised communties in order to increase their entitlement

As the project name indicates the main purpose of the project was to improve water security and sanitation amongst marginalised communities so the people of the targeted area will be aware about the importance of sanitation health and hygiene and thus take proper care of their health and live in healhty environment.

The main purpose of the project was to ensure food security among the farmers of the targeted villages as they are fully dependedt on agriculture for their livelihood. In this way they can produce seed and thus increase their income by selling it in the market nearby. With this the next purpose was also to reduce migration in the targeted villages as the youth go to the other places for getting job. Women were also actively participating in the seed production programme and they are still active

The main purpose of the project was to contribute to poverty reduction through integrated water management in the targeted area and to construct or replicate models and other structure for improving watermanagement in the targeted village . In this way the purpose also aims to increase the entitlement of the people in the village .

The purpose of the project was to make the targeted communities of the targeted area about the importance of sanitation and improving water security. In this way the purpose of the project was also to make the people understand about the safe and clean environment health and hygiene.

The main purpose of the project was to make the marginalised farmers aware about the Lac cultivation Arhar Cultivation and paddy cultivation. The farmers are now capacitated and trained in cultivation of Lac Arhar and paddy cultivation.With this now there is reduction in migration and thus income is generated to increase their livelihood.

The main purpose of the project was to promote water conservation models as an effective alternative of famine for the farmers from the targeted area .The farmers were also facilitated and thus the farmers were motivated towards ECOSAN toilet and Matka Filter

The main purpose of the project was to capacitate Dalit Adivasi and women CSOS for sustainable development and promoting diversity and social inclusion. In this way the project ensure right and entitlement and make the communities aware about their rights and entitlement and fight for it.

The project aims to make the people aware about the Child right child welafare and other related child issues through Childline services 1098.The common people who were unaware about the child right before are now aware and they take the issue of child seriously and call on 1098 to take help from childline services. In this way the Childline services are Twenty four hours services given for the protection of children age from 0 to 18 years.

The main purpose of the project was to capacitate farmers of the targeted area about ssed production through scientific technique and thus increase their livelihood through agriculture. The project also aims to reduce migration through this progranmme so that the farmers can train temself and cultivate in their own villages and should not wander to other places in search of work.

The main purpose of the given project was to contribute to poverty reduction and sustainable development amongst marginalised communities in the targeted area of the given block. The people were trained and capacitated to construct or replicate the structure for water conservation such as model and matka filter. Another was construction of Ahar for irrigation facilities.

The main purpose of the given project was as the name indicates to improve the water security and sanitation among marginalized communities in the targeted village. detailsOfAchievement: SAMRIDDHI FOUNDATION has brought up tremendous socio and economic development of the needy community within the span of its effective working since last 2 years of duration. In the field of women empowerment it has successfully formed 150 SHGs which are functional and have been linked up with the banks for their livelihood promotion. Around 500 women SHGS members have been trained on trades like Poultry, Piggery, Goatary, Pickle Making, Pappad and Bari Making, Bamboo Craft, Jute Craft, Sewing And Cutting, Etc. Income Generation Activities have been initiated by the SHG members. 800 children of age 6 to 14 years are benefited by the Non formal education program and till date around 1500 out of school children have been enrolled successfully in government school for continued education. The organization is handling the managing the affairs of Tourism. The organization has actively participated in the plantation and environment conservation activities. Numerous Research and study has been done on the issues like education, health, mother and child care, etc. Improvement in the health status of women and children has been brought up. Around 150000 rural populations have been fully acknowledged on the issues related to HIV AIDS. Apart from this activities like health and hygiene, RCH, Environment conservation, Tourism, Research, etc. Overall impact of the program and activities is quite effective. the organization is working for overall community development of the deprived, underprivileged and marginalized section of the society. The organization is working in more than 200 villages of Ranchi, Latehar, Garhwa & Palamu Districts in Jharkhand. More than 150 SHGs are functioning in an effective manner. 100 SHGs have been linked up with the nationalized banks of their respective areas for financial assistance. Around 2500 children of age group 6 to 14 years have been enrolled to government schools for continued education. Around 750 women, youths and girls of poor community have been induced entrepreneur skills on trades like Food Processing, Beauticians, Goatary, Dairy, Poultry, Fisheries, Duckery, Agriculture, Tailoring, Embroidery, Bamboo Craft, Doll Making, Etc. The organization is running Child labor school in which around 100 children engaged as child labor have been enrolled and benefited by the education & vocational training for their rehabilitation in future. Majority of the women of the target areas are aware of HIV AIDS. Tremendous improvements in the health status of the target community are found. People are adopting healthy practices for preventing themselves against infectious and communicable diseases. Women are empowered enough and actively participating to eradicate the community level social issues like â€“ Alcoholism, Child Abuse, Child labor, Witchcraft, Women Violence, Dowry, etc. 300 children of poor community are being educated by means of formal school education program. Around 500 out of school children have been induce education skill through this program and have been enrolled successfully in the nearby government school for their continued education. The organization is working for the promotion and sustenance of the Tribal arts, & Culture. 1500 mixed fruit plantation has been done on community land to promote livelihood as an alternative source of income apart from agriculture. Community health services are being provided by the organization for the poor and marginalized people. Awareness has been brought up on health, hygiene, nutrition, safe delivery system, RCH, immunization, environment conservation, watershed and modern agriculture farming and sanitation. The organization has identified and rescued 40 adolescent girls from being trafficked and handover to their respective guardian which is one of the greatest achievements at organization level. In the field of convergence with government schemes majority of the target SHGs and their adult family members have been linked up with job cards, Maternity benefit, Indira awaas, red & yellow cards yozna. The organization has devoted team constituted of experts of Disaster management. It is often participating to support the sufferers of drought, famine and flood. Overall impact of the program and activities is effective and fruitful.

detailsOfAchievement: Land and Water Management : As a part of wastland development programme under national Horticulture Mission Samridhi has planted cashew in 202.92 hectare and mango in 130 hectare of land in Chakulia Block of East Singhbhum District of Jharkhand. sourceOfFunds.purpose: The main purpose of the organisation is to make the marginal communities self sustainable, advancing the rights of such, like women, girls, urban poor, transgender persons, sexual minorities, single women, HIV positive persons, people living with disabilities, etc.

The main objective of the organization is to advancing the rights of marginal communities such as women, girls, urban poor, unorganized workers including sex workers, transgender persons, sexual minorities, single women, HIV positive persons, people who inject drugs (PWID) and people living with disabilities.

The main focus of the organization this year was in conducting skill development and self sustainable trainings to the marginal communities such as tribal women, girls, urban poor, transgender persons, sexual minorities, single women, HIV positive persons, people living with disabilities etc.
